author: parchioso
title: What I want in Lego 3835 Robo Champ
review:
Do you think playing a game by picking up parts for Robo building is fun? I don't. But why do I get this Lego 3835 Robo Champ?

Simple, because of the parts, you may check out a photo of the parts inventory at my blog and you may agree with me:

http://brickand.me/2009/11/24/WhatIWantInLego3835RoboChamp.aspx

The 1x1 tiles alone are quite costly, especially the green ones, believe it or not, someone is selling it at more than USD 2 per piece!

And the three Robots are quite cute indeed! I have set them up for some fun photos!

It is worth buying as a souvenir item, the parts themselves are worth the money, plus you can play the game if you have young kids at home.

author: Legonat
title: My first (and hopefully not last) Lego games set
review:
• My brother and I split the cost for this by each only paying $4.99

            Pros

            Good pieces such as 1x1 circular plates with holes (6 [7 if you count the extra]
            ), 1x2 plate with joint (12), Lego dice (1), Goblet (1), and control panel (1),

            Fun to play with (My brother and I have played it about 10 times in the past two
            days,

            Three robots, Blue robot, Red robot, and Green robot,
           
            2 to 3 players


            Cons

            The wrench gets nicks on it when used,

            Should be 2 to 4 players,

            Green robot is way too small


            Overall a 5/5

author: power_miner2020
title: Want my robo arm?
review:
I got this set like a week ago an it was at target.A with other lego games.Sorry I posted this late I was goingto do this early but I was lazy 

anyway it was $9.99.

what time is it? Pros and cons time!

 pros

  • one of my mom's favorite lego games
  • rubber lego dice
  • new 1x1lego stud piece

cons

  • cheap

well that is it see ya next time!

author: Dominippy_yes_i_am_from_youtube
title: cute bots
review:
The game is fun to play but i win each time playeng against friends.

 

Wins: a lot

losses: none

Pros

  • Pro 1 fun to play
  • Pro 2 easy to learn
  • pro 3 good for your money

Cons

  • Con 1 can go on forever

 

 

The game is good for your money and robots are cute but it games can be terrible long and i win each time but its good.
